title: KitchedAid 5 (more then 20 color variants, capacity 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in single batch, 59 touch points planetary mixing, includes: Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, Pouring Shield)
descriptions:
Meet the KitchedAid 5: the stand mixer that turns everyday baking into effortless brilliance. With more than 20 stunning color options, this countertop icon is designed to match your style and power your creativity.

Why you’ll love it:
- Big-batch performance: Mix up to 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch, perfect for parties, meal prep, and holiday baking.
- Silky-smooth results: Planetary mixing with 59 touch points per rotation delivers thorough, consistent blending—no dry pockets, no overmixing.
- Built to last: A durable metal construction and a 5-quart stainless steel bowl with a comfortable handle stand up to years of whisking, kneading, and folding. The bowl is dishwasher safe for easy cleanup.
- Precision control: 10 speeds let you gently fold, whip to peaks, or power through dense dough with confidence.
- Convenient tilt-head design: Easily add ingredients, check consistency, and swap tools without breaking your flow.

Everything you need to get started is included:
- 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl
- Coated Flat Beater
- Coated Dough Hook
- 6-Wire Whip
- Pouring Shield

Ready to do more than mix? Expand your culinary repertoire with 10+ optional, hub-powered attachments (sold separately)—from fresh pasta and spiralized veggies to ground meats and homemade ice cream.

From weeknight cookies to celebration cakes and artisan loaves, the KitchedAid 5 gives you the capacity, control, and confidence to create your best bakes yet. Choose your color, press start, and taste the difference.
